sentences.en: A microscope magnifies bacteria so that they can be seen and studied.
sentences.cn: 显微镜把细菌放大,使人们得以看见并研究它.

sentences.en: All bacteria are larger than viruses.
Bacteria are invisible to the naked eye.
Bacteria reproduce by dividing and making copies of themselves.
sentences.cn: 细菌通过分裂和自我复制来繁殖。

sentences.en: Bacteria sticks to food debris in the teeth, causing decay.
sentences.cn: 细菌附着在牙缝中的食物残渣上, 导致蛀牙.

sentences.en: Bacteria was introduced into his bloodstream through an unsterile needle.
sentences.cn: 细菌通过未消毒的针进入了他的血流中.

sentences.en: But she correctly points out that bacteria are everywhere: on us, in us and all around us.
sentences.cn: 但是她正确地指出细菌无处不在：在我们身上，在我们体内以及在我们周围。

sentences.en: Chlorine is added to kill bacteria.
Hot weather multiplied the bacteria in milk rapidly.
sentences.cn: 炎热的天气使牛奶中的细菌迅速繁殖.

sentences.en: Is it possible to multiply bacteria in the laboratory?
sentences.cn: 有可能在实验室繁殖细菌吗?

sentences.en: Once in the bloodstream, the bacteria adhere to the surface of the red cells.
sentences.cn: 细菌一进入血液里，就附着在红细胞表面上。

sentences.en: Some of these bacteria are actually good for you.
sentences.cn: 实际上，这些细菌有的对你是很有好处的。

sentences.en: The bacteria are harmless to humans.
The bacteria get into humans through abrasions in the skin.
sentences.cn: 细菌可以通过擦伤处进入人体.

sentences.en: The biology of bacteria can be quite hard to understand.
sentences.cn: 细菌生物学有时会很难理解.

sentences.en: Warm milk is the ideal breeding ground for bacteria.
sentences.cn: 温牛奶是细菌理想的滋生地。

sentences.en: Wash everything thoroughly to avoid contamination with bacteria.
sentences.cn: 把所有东西都彻底洗净以避免细菌污染.

sentences.en: When you eat off the plate, all of those bacteria go into your stomach.
sentences.cn: 当你吃掉了盘子里的食物时，这些细菌就会进入你的肚子。

[生化] 溶菌作用；细菌分解处理

trans.tran_en: very small living things, some of which cause illness or disease
